overview:
Welcome to Rentfromtheowner.co.uk, the brand new, state-of-the-art property letting website that puts Landlords in control of letting their property.

Rentfromtheowner.co.uk cleverly provides the on-line and local marketing that is a hallmark of the traditional letting agentâ€™s service without the bits that many people do not need - and often do not want to pay for. That is why a growing number of savvy people are choosing us to help them let their property.

We provide you with the means to easily promote your property 24 hours a day, 7 days a week. And with 2 excellent value package options together with the chance to buy one of our professional ‘To Let’ boards, you decide the level of impact. We also provide the option to buy a range of landlord documents, so you can set up your tenancy quickly, efficiently and above all, legally.

In short, why pay thousands in commission when you can let your property through Rentfromtheowner.co.uk?

offices.address1: Rex Clement Limited 50 Broadway St. James's Park
